text: The Geoagiu (Hungarian: Gyógy-patak or Diódi-patak) is a right tributary of the river Mureș in Transylvania, Romania. It discharges into the Mureș in Teiuș. Its length is and its basin size is . ==Tributaries== The following rivers are tributaries to the river Geoagiu: *Left: Tomești, Geoagel ==References== * Trasee turistice - judeţul Alba Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Alba County
title: Geoagiu (Alba)
